Package org.carrot2.clustering.lingo

package org.carrot2.clustering.lingo
Implementation of the Lingo clustering algorithm.
See Also:
  • "https://www.computer.org/csdl/10.1109/MIS.2005.38"
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.carrot2.clustering
    Clustering algorithms, public API interfaces for handling documents, clusters.
    org.carrot2.clustering.kmeans
    Implementation of the bisecting k-means clustering algorithm.
    org.carrot2.clustering.stc
    Implementation of the STC clustering algorithm.
  • Class
    Description
    ClusterBuilder
    Builds cluster labels based on the reduced term-document matrix and assigns documents to the labels.
    FeatureScorer
    Generates additional scores for features.
    LabelAssigner
    Assigns labels to base vectors obtained from the factorization.
    LingoClusteringAlgorithm
    Lingo clustering algorithm.
    LingoProcessingContext
    Stores intermediate data required during Lingo clustering.
    LingoProvider
     
    SimpleLabelAssigner
    A simple and fast label assigner.
    UniqueLabelAssigner
    Assigns unique labels to each base vector using a greedy algorithm.
